sample_docs: Creating a safer tomorrow in your world AI-powered computer vision protects associates and enables frictionless access to spaces while providing operational intelligence for space, risk and energy management. Contactless access control combines facial recognition, thermal, and behavioral analytics to manage authorized persons, visitors, and watchlist. edge-based processing with infinite scale cloud computing. No port forwards or VPNs plus end-to-end encryption during transport and at rest. AI platform: actionable analytics protect people and assets while driving ROI.
